blogPost.excerpt: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.
blogPost.body: Accept payments anywhere online, no coding required. PriceBlocs helps you close more sales in any channel through our super low friction payment links. Accept Apple Pay and Google Pay in just a few clicks.
blogPost.title: PriceBlocs - Accept payments online with just a link
blogPost.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: 随时随地在线接受支付，无需编码。PriceBlocs通过我们超低摩擦的支付链接帮助您在任何渠道完成更多的销售。只需点击几下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一个链接就能在线接受付款

localize.description: 隨時隨地在線接受支付，無需編碼。PriceBlocs通過我們超低摩擦的支付鏈接幫助您在任何渠道完成更多的銷售。只需點擊幾下就能接受Apple Pay和Google Pay。
localize.tagline: 只需一個鏈接就能在線接受付款

previous.excerpt: breakthru is a curated list of 40+ self-care tools & resources. It's not easy to find mental health solutions on the internet. Spend less time searching and more time working on your mental well being by trying out apps, podcasts, newsletters on breakthru.
previous.title: breakthru - Curated apps & resources for your mental health

localize.description: 断舍离是一个精选的40+自我保健工具和资源的列表。在互联网上找到心理健康解决方案并不容易。通过在breakthru上尝试应用程序，播客，新闻简报，花更少的时间搜索和更多的时间在你的心理健康上工作。
localize.tagline: 为您的心理健康策划的应用程序和资源

localize.description: 斷舍離是一個精選的40+自我保健工具和資源的列表。在互聯網上找到心理健康解決方案並不容易。通過在breakthru上嘗試應用程序，播客，新聞簡報，花更少的時間搜索和更多的時間在你的心理健康上工作。
localize.tagline: 爲您的心理健康策劃的應用程序和資源

next.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
next.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home

localize.description: 我们在这里帮助您体验二手房所有权的乐趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花费1/8的成本就能拥有一套二手房，同时避免了传统置业的麻烦。我们会帮您找到最合适的房子。您决定您想拥有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 现代人购买和拥有第二套住房的方式。

localize.description: 我們在這裏幫助您體驗二手房所有權的樂趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花費1/8的成本就能擁有一套二手房，同時避免了傳統置業的麻煩。我們會幫您找到最合適的房子。您決定您想擁有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 現代人購買和擁有第二套住房的方式。
